captions.text:
- So Justin and I--
before the show start,

some either lucky
or unfortunate women

got to experience
us hiding in the bathroom.

So this is what we did
before y'all came in.

[both singing]
Like baby, baby, baby, oh

Nice meeting you
in the bathroom.

title: Justin Bieber and Ellen Scare Audience Members
